Desert Pain Specialists serves Richfield, Utah and surrounding communities with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our team of board-certified physicians specializes in treating both acute and chronic pain conditions through innovative, evidence-based approaches. We believe in addressing pain at its root cause rather than simply masking symptoms, allowing our patients to regain functionality and improve their quality of life. Located in the heart of Richfield, our modern facility is equipped with state-of-the-art diagnostic and treatment technologies to provide the highest standard of care.

At Desert Pain Specialists, we understand that pain affects each person differently. That's why we develop individualized treatment plans tailored to each patient's specific needs and circumstances. Our multidisciplinary approach combines interventional procedures, medication management, physical therapy recommendations, and lifestyle modifications to achieve optimal results. We pride ourselves on staying at the forefront of pain medicine, continuously incorporating cutting-edge treatments and techniques into our practice.

Conditions We Treat

Our experienced physicians address a wide range of pain conditions, including but not limited to back and neck pain, joint pain, neuropathic pain, complex regional pain syndrome, post-surgical pain, and cancer-related pain. Whether you're dealing with a recent injury or have been struggling with chronic pain for years, our team has the expertise to help you find relief and restore function.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with our pain management specialists, please call us at +1 435-238-7000 or visit our website at desertpainspecialists.com. Our clinic is conveniently located at 245 N Main St, Richfield, UT 84701. We accept most major insurance plans and are committed to making our services accessible to those in need of pain relief.

Utah Pain Center serves Ogden, Utah and surrounding communities with specialized pain management services under the direction of Dr. Alex Jonathan Nelson, MD. Located in Weber County, our center provides comprehensive care for patients suffering from acute and chronic pain conditions, offering personalized treatment plans that address the unique needs of each individual. Our approach combines cutting-edge medical interventions with holistic pain management strategies to help patients regain control of their lives and improve their overall quality of life.

Dr. Alex Jonathan Nelson was born and raised in northern Utah, maintaining strong ties to the community he now serves. After completing his undergraduate studies at the University of Utah, he pursued his medical education at The Ohio State University College of Medicine. His academic excellence was recognized through multiple prestigious awards, including a Dean's Scholarship, Dean's Leadership Scholarship, the Samuel J. Roessler Memorial research scholarship, and the Department of Neurology outstanding performance award.

In addition to his medical doctorate, Dr. Nelson enhanced his administrative expertise by completing a Master of Health Administration in the OSU College of Public Health after receiving a university graduate fellowship. This dual specialization allows him to provide exceptional clinical care while efficiently managing the operational aspects of Utah Pain Center.

Our Approach to Pain Management

At Utah Pain Center, we believe in addressing pain at its source rather than simply masking symptoms. Dr. Nelson combines his extensive medical knowledge with advanced diagnostic techniques to identify the underlying causes of pain. Our treatment protocols may include minimally invasive procedures, medication management, physical therapy recommendations, and lifestyle modifications tailored to each patient's specific condition.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation with Dr. Nelson or learn more about our services, please contact us at +1 801-810-7246. Our facility is conveniently located at 1276 Wall Ave #2, Ogden, UT 84404. Additional information about our practice and treatment options can be found on our website at www.utahpaincenter.com/utah-doctor-dr-nelson.

He received multiple honors during his medical studies, including a Dean's Scholarship, Dean's Leadership Scholarship, the Samuel J. Roessler Memorial research scholarship, and the Department of Neurology outstanding performance award.

On my FIRST visit, Dr. Nelson pointed out the possible culprit. In an attempt to verify/clarify, he scheduled me for a visit to one of his colleagues. They nailed it!  I'm now in the process of being treated for my condition.

I recommend his knowledge and expertise to anyone willing to explore avenues of healing!|Dr. Nelson and Desiree are my absolute favorite providers. They're both so caring and have been amazing with my treatments/ care. They take their time especially on the days that I am in more pain than usual when I am having any of my injections. I refuse to see anyone else even if that means I pay a bit more for my copay. Bree is one of my favorite MAs as well, my last visit I was extremely exhausted and she brightened my day. Bree also goes to bat for me whenever my insurance or the speciality pharmacy is being a pain. I go here for spinal pain and chronic migraines. I will never see any other providers.|Finding Dr. Nelson and his team has been life changing for me.  Being treated respectfully allows me to be candid and open about the functional issues that up until recently have been dismissed by others doctors noting my age with disbelief of my symptoms.  There are many ways to combat pain that do not involve narcotics.  I refer others to Interventional Spine and Pain Management with confidence!|Dr Nelson has treated me for two years, with his knowledge and my useless reading the internet we have tried everything to stop my back pain. I needed to lose weight to have surgery, I've lost 80 lbs. First we're trying pain block to see if that works, if not looks like surgery might be next. Dr Nelson is one of the most pleasant doctors I've seen.|Edit: I wrote this review in place of my wife, Carmina I. She will be in your records. You will see my name under her file. So, no, I will not remove this review.

If you're looking for an adequate job that doesn't exceed your expectations, these folks are just the type. The staff is nice enough, but give odd looks to you if you ask too many questions. I've had to ask for my MRI scans on 4 seperate occasions with three different people and it took me over 6 weeks to finally get them. The staff also appears to, what feels like, worship Dr. Nelson who can be demeaning to female patients. At every appointment, he made comments as to how small or teeny I am. The only reason I stayed with them was because I had a time crunch and essentially no geographical option closer. They'll work, but if I could've gone to other people, I would've. If I could, I would give 0 stars.|***Update, I have now been going here for 9 months.  My opinions on Dr. Nelson have not changed he is kind and caring.  The PA Desiree has been amazing also with my scs implant follow-ups and also with the continued pain.  I love dealing with Laurel she is sweet and the rest of the staff has been great.
I'd recommend this office to friends and family alike.

I have been to the clinic just one time but I have to say that the staff is amazing to deal with.  It takes a bit to get a call back at times but they do call back.  Dr. Neilson is amazing, kind,  understanding and very personable.
To be honest after reading some reviews I had fears but without hesitation they have been wonderful.|I up graded to 4 stars on Jan 14 2025.
Still upset, but now I come to know it wasn't all Dr. Nelson fault things were done that Dr.Nelson didn't know about.

Please disregard original message below.

If you see this Doctor make sure that you review your billing statements. I have had major problems with billing to the point that I will no longer use Dr Nelson as a pain doctor.
I tried to bring this problem to the attention of the billing company, their response was, "that's just the way we do things here". I requested a full audit of my account, they came back and said "we think we forgot to charge you for a visit, so we're adding an additional $35 to your account.  Several times they reported I only paid $30, when I in-fact paid my full copay of $35.
I also brought this to the attention of Dr. Nelson, and his office manager, they came back with, everything looks okay on our end, so you need to pay $200.10 + $35, before you can be seen again. And by the way, you'll need to pay $180 plus the $35 copy from here on out.

One last thing, I had an appointment on Aug 31st, I paid my $35 copay, but when I got to see the Doctor he told me they ordered the wrong Medication, and I would have to come back.
When I went back in 12 days later for my medication, I had to pay a $35 copay AGAIN! So now I had to pay $70 for injection I should have gotten 12 days before. I'm not a happy camper, and I never received a satisfactory answer to my billing questions.

column2: Southwest Spine & Pain Center - Heber City
column3:
Southwest Spine & Pain Center serves Heber City, Utah and surrounding communities with specialized pain management services. Our facility operates every other Thursday, so we encourage patients to call ahead to confirm Thursday/Friday availability and schedule appointments. With a team of double-board certified pain management specialists, we're committed to providing comprehensive care for both acute and chronic pain conditions.

At Southwest Spine & Pain Center, we utilize a multifaceted approach to pain treatment that includes:

- Injection therapies

- Minimally invasive surgical procedures

- Management of appropriate pain medications

- Coordination of physical therapy

- Advanced imaging services

Our Commitment to Patient Care

Our dedicated pain management doctors understand how debilitating chronic pain can be. We work closely with each patient to develop personalized treatment plans designed to improve quality of life and help you return to the activities you enjoy. Our goal is simple: to help you live life to the fullest, free from the limitations of chronic pain.

Location and Contact Information

Address: 1716 U.S. Hwy 40, Suite 201, Heber City, UT 84032, United States

Phone: +1 435-709-4202

Website: [https://www.southwestspineandpain.com/locations/heber-city-new](https://www.southwestspineandpain.com/locations/heber-city-new)

Please remember to call ahead to confirm our schedule and make an appointment, as our Heber City location operates every other Thursday.
column11:
Open every other Thursday - Please call to confirm Thursday/Friday availability and to schedule an appointment

At Southwest Spine & Pain Center, our double-board certified pain management specialists provide comprehensive pain care by using a wide variety of treatment options. This includes injection therapies, minimally invasive surgery, management of appropriate pain medications, and coordinating physical therapy and advanced imaging.

Whether you are suffering from acute or chronic pain, the pain management doctors at Southwest Spine & Pain Center are dedicated to helping you live life to the fullest.
column38: Mickey Smith|Sherry Turner Nichols|Nancy Boyer|Paul Ziter|Nick Kershner|Kristen Klingler|Tina Menor|Cindy Brindley
column40:
Dr Talbott and his assistant Jessica and clinic are amazing at what they do. They have all went beyond to help with all my needs. They 100% care for their patients and make them feel comfortable.|Dr Talbott is wonderful!  Listens to your problem and explains what should be done to correct the situation.  After many years of pain and epidurals that still did not help while living n Florida, he has finally helped me!  I could not be more pleased.|Holly is a great provider, always answers questions that might have concerns for me. She's very friendly and I really like her a lot. She also make sure that I'm taking care of as far as physical pain. I can't say enough about her and I appreciate The fact that she's always is on time and my whole day is not spent at the doctors office.|As a retired pro hockey player ... the most violent sport,  I've had many experiences with Drs for my jacked up back, shoulders, knees, etc. I've had so many Drs over the years and I can honestly say Talbot is the best of the best!!!|Documented history of chronic pain, pain returned. I went to SWSP to help find the root of the problem, after going to the ER 3 times for pain.

They agreed to give me pain killers until we were able to find another way to manage the pain. Due to their mistake on sending in MRI requests, my MRI was denied and could not be re-requested for 45 days.

The doctor then refused to prescribe more pain medication to get me to the imaging, and to the alternative treatment options. Their answer to my question of what happens when the pain comes back, they said "go to the ER".

There is a "conflicting" medication I take from another doctor for over 25 years. I called that doctor and they confirmed that not keeping my pain under control was the wrong choice on SWSP.

So now I'll have level 10 pain in about 2 days with no help from the same practice that screwed up my imaging and timeline to begin with. They caused the problem. They won't fix it.

WILL NOT RETURN.

Update after practice response:
Their response is inaccurate as imaging was denied due to lack of providing information that only they have, NOT from an outside provider in ANY WAY. I additionally discovered in my medical records that the insurance company DID try to help them resolve the denial, however the doctor did not do the PVP process offered.

I called to speak with the clinic manager, and when discussing the issue she made me aware that she was not able to address my questions, could not clarify the misunderstandings and actually got quite a bit of an attitude with me while I was professional, calm and polite. She was very upset when I referenced FDA guidelines, and when I asked for a copy of the Risk-Benefit analysis that was done. A risk-benefit analysis template is provided by the FDA, and further encouraged use of this in their updated guidelines in 2021. The doctors here are still operating under the FDA's 2016 guidelines. When I mentioned this, Jessica got VERY upset and in an elevated tone said "SIR HE IS A MEDICAL DOCTOR..." as if somehow that makes him a better person than me. It seems to me that this practice will get upset if they think you're telling them how to do their job, when you're simply advocating for your own health.|Dr. Talbott is excellent! His staff as well! Definitely recommend his office!|My appointment was at 10:10am this morning. Waited in the waiting room for 20 minutes than another 45+ minutes in the room for the doctor, So I left!! This is the second time this happened.
Never again!!!|My experience has been great with Holly Cunningham.  I felt like she understood and listened and came up with a plan moving forward.

column3:
Advanced Spine & Disc serves Murray, Utah and surrounding communities with specialized care for patients suffering from chronic back and neck pain. Are you struggling with degenerative disc disease, sciatica, herniated discs, or spinal stenosis? Our dedicated team provides comprehensive, non-invasive treatment options designed to deliver lasting relief without resorting to surgery, injections, or medication. Located conveniently in Murray, we've built our reputation on helping patients reclaim their active lifestyles through innovative spinal care techniques and personalized treatment plans.

At Advanced Spine & Disc, we understand that no two patients experience pain in exactly the same way. Our spine specialists take the guesswork out of finding the right treatment by conducting thorough evaluations and leveraging cutting-edge technology. The state-of-the-art DRX9000 spinal decompression system is just one of the advanced tools we utilize to provide non-surgical solutions for complex spinal conditions. This revolutionary technology helps create negative pressure within the disc, allowing for rehydration and healing of damaged discs without invasive procedures.

Our Commitment to Pain-Free Living

We firmly believe that everyone deserves to live without the limitations of chronic back and neck pain. Our patient-centered approach focuses on addressing the root cause of your discomfort rather than merely masking symptoms. Through customized treatment protocols, we've helped countless patients avoid risky surgeries while achieving significant, lasting pain relief. Our team works diligently to educate patients about their conditions and empower them with the knowledge needed to maintain spinal health long-term.

Contact Us

If you're ready to win the battle against persistent back and neck pain, contact Advanced Spine & Disc today to schedule your consultation. Our office is located at 5250 Commerce Dr #155, Murray, UT 84107. You can reach us by phone at (801) 747-7776 or visit our website at https://advancedspineutah.com/ to learn more about our services and treatment options. Take the first step toward a pain-free life with Murray's trusted spine and disc specialists.

Joint Regeneration Center of Utah serves Salt Lake City, Utah and surrounding communities with innovative non-surgical solutions for joint pain and mobility issues. Our specialized clinic focuses on breakthrough treatments for osteoarthritis and degenerative joint disease, helping patients avoid invasive surgeries while regaining their quality of life. The center's comprehensive approach addresses knee, joint, and muscle pain through advanced regenerative medicine techniques delivered by our experienced medical team in a comfortable, patient-centered environment.

At Joint Regeneration Center of Utah, we understand how debilitating joint pain can be. Our award-winning team utilizes cutting-edge therapies designed to stimulate your body's natural healing processes. These treatments target the underlying causes of joint deterioration rather than simply masking symptoms, potentially helping patients avoid costly and painful surgical interventions while promoting long-term joint health and function.

Comprehensive Weight Management Solutions

Recognizing the connection between weight and joint health, we proudly offer Semaglutide weight loss treatments for patients struggling with weight management. Excess weight places significant stress on joints, often exacerbating pain and accelerating deterioration. Our medically supervised weight loss programs provide the support needed to achieve sustainable weight reduction, ultimately reducing pressure on painful joints and enabling patients to return to their desired activity levels.

Visit Our Salt Lake City Location

Our modern facility is conveniently located at 6699 S 1300 E STE 150, Salt Lake City, UT 84121. We invite you to schedule a consultation with our team to discuss your specific concerns and develop a personalized treatment plan. Contact us today at (801) 996-3592 or visit www.regenerationutah.com to learn more about how we can help you overcome joint pain and mobility limitations without surgery.

Neuragenex serves Lehi, Utah as a pioneering chronic pain management clinic dedicated to transforming lives through innovative, non-invasive treatment approaches. Founded with the vision of providing next-generation pain solutions, Neuragenex has rapidly established itself as the nation's fastest-growing chronic pain treatment practice by offering alternatives that not only alleviate discomfort but actively improve overall health outcomes.

At Neuragenex Lehi, patients discover a refreshingly different approach to chronic pain. The clinic's treatment protocols are entirely non-pharmaceutical, non-surgical, non-invasive, and non-chiropractic, addressing the fundamental causes of pain rather than merely masking symptoms. This philosophy has positioned Neuragenex as a leader in sustainable pain management solutions that avoid the pitfalls of medication dependency and invasive procedures.

A Mission of Holistic Healing

The clinic's three-part mission guides every aspect of patient care:

- Relieve Pain through advanced protocols

- Restore Health by addressing underlying conditions

- Magnify Quality of Life by enabling patients to return to activities they love

Conveniently located at 1014 S 1100 W, Lehi, UT 84043, the clinic welcomes patients from throughout Utah County and beyond. column40:
I have been receiving treatment for neuropathy in my feet and legs for several weeks from Neuragenex in Lehi. The reduction in pain and numbness, and the increase in mobility, is nothing short of amazing.  I can finally sleep and walk normally.  The doctors, therapists and nurses are friendly, kind and competent.  I highly recommend this clinic and services to anyone who desires significant results.|I have Parkinson's Disease.  I have had it for at least 16 years and have experienced a decline in balance, muscle control, mental ability and walking.  Since I feel the nerves are central to this degeneration, I was interested when an ad for Neuragenex and the new Lehi location arrived in my mailbox.  I set up an intake appointment in spite of the 45 minute drive each way.  Now more than half-way thru treatment I have found much improvement in my right knee and restless, burning legs which were preventing me from sleeping at night.  I look for more improvement as I move through the remaining treatments.  I am also VERY impressed with the staff's helpfulness, friendly manner and knowledge.|The staff is great! Competent, professional and friendly are how I can describe everyone I've met. And the treatments so far (I'm only 1/6th of the way through the regimen) have reduced my pain significantly. I'm looking forward to the rest of the treatment plan and my interactions with the staff!|I went to Neuragenex, Lehi facility, and tried one of their treatments. It was amazing! I've suffered from low back for 20 plus years. Some days I have a hard time bending over. After the treatment I was able to bend over with out stiffness or pain. I look forward to more treatment. The staff was very friendly and interactive!|I spent two visits and time at home filling out paperwork for my appointment. The receptionist took photos of my insurance and drivers license. A total waste of time.  When the staff person brought me in he asked about my select health insurance and said they hadn't been able to work with select health. The receptionist should have known that and saved me all the time and hassle!  Very poor review.  Would not Ed omens that facility.|I always recommend my friends to Neuragenex whenever they come into town here if they have neuropathy pain.  I sent in a friend in last year for fibromyalgia and he said it was awesome.  I hope the location in Lehi is as good as the one close to me.

I think medicine and drugs has a place for pain for sure, but the idea of not having to rely on drugs or needles is awesome.  I can see why some people would want the needles side as well if that is what you are used to.  I like the Neuragenex approach to sciatica and back pain way better though.|I am so impressed with Neuragenex and their team. They want the best outcome for their patients. Their next generation technology has relieved my pain within just a few treatments. I am so grateful I found them to manage my pain with out medications.|I was pushed into an appointment without being told if they took my insurance. When I called my insurnace today to verify I was told that they weren't under my plan so I called to cancel my appointment. The man asked if I was in pain and I said that I was he said I could pay out of pocket but I said I couldn't afford it. The man then said "I guess you aren't actually in that much pain then." I think this place is a scam but in case it's not maybe they'll fire the man. His name is Gary.

Absolutely! It's actually quite amazing how effective our treatment program is. column40:
We were referred to Dr. Adelman for my son's back in 2023. My son was only 26 years old and had been suffering for six years with chronic back pain and Dr. Adelman suggested a micro discectomy. The office staff/Dr was very helpful at first, but after the surgery, he found no relief and the same consistent pain. There was no follow up in person or on the phone except when we made the phone call . We asked for referrals to physical therapy and they had none. Unfortunately, I would not recommend this office.

2 months ago, my son had a displacement Replacement with another doctors office. The doctors explained everything so well going into The surgery, have consistently called us for Monthly checkups, sent us to a referred physical therapist and had 24 hour on-call service. What an amazing difference! He was up walking around on day one and is enjoying getting back into nature, Having a social life, and living a great life.|Dr. Adelman and his medical team rocks!! He was recommended to be me by a colleague. I went to see him for a second opinion with my condition. Straightforward, no nonsense, tell it like it is, kind of medicine. He recommended a diagnostic procedure, but didn't make me feel like I needed to do it at his clinic. He even said that I could follow up with my current physician to do it...but that it really should be done for diagnostic purposes. He seemed to be genuinely concerned with getting me back to a pain free existence and the patient seems to be at the heart of his practice. I appreciated his candor and honesty. He has over 30 years of medical experience in the orthopedic surgical field. Clinic was immaculate.|I usually avoid doctors, but Dr. Angela Krull is the best doctor I have ever had to visit.  She is so kind, caring and compassionate and is extremely sharp, dedicated and always helpful.  I have never left her office not feeling better about our treatment plan.  If you have pain or an injury and need excellent care, she is outstanding.  The staff is all very kind and welcoming.|I have been going to The Smart Clinic for five years now and they have been incredible!!! Before finding The Smart Clinic, my search for a
doctor to get any relief from my back pain was a joke. Being 30 with back issues makes doctors skeptical and in return they treat me like garbage without looking at my medical history. I lift weights, played college basketball and now I handle luggage for Delta Air Lines. To say I'm hard on my body is an understatement. It took me a few years of going through awful doctors before I finally made it to The Smart Clinic. Dr. Ancha has been AMAZING! She actually listens to me and has always treated me with kindness and respect. I usually get anxiety when it comes to talking to doctors because they don't listen to me and they downplay what I'm telling them. I know it's not as common for someone as young as I am to have such a bad back, but it does happen and I just want to be taken seriously and treated like doctors care about my well being and the issues that I'm bringing to them to treat. That is exactly how everyone at The Smart Clinic has treated me. The entire staff is easy and pleasant to work with. I always recommend my coworkers to The Smart Clinic because of the wonderful and the attentive service that I receive every time I go in. They have definitely improved my quality of life and they continue to make it better as we keep making progress. Thank you to everyone at The Smart Clinic. You really have made my life so much better.|My wife has had back issues for years and before The Smart Clinic, we were only able to find doctors who didn't believe her and tried to just throw an ibuprofen at the issue and call it quits. The staff here at The Smart Clinic have been the complete opposite. We're still in the process of getting things fixed and it's taken a lot of time but they've never given up on her and never look down on her. When she goes in, I have complete confidence that she's going to be comfortable and treated with kindness and respect. That same kindness and respect is shown to me and our daughter as well. When we go in they treat us like family and make us feel truly loved and appreciated. We had to switch insurance not too long ago to one they didn't accept and it wasn't even a second thought to keep going to them anyway. Thank you for taking such good of her!!|The SMART Clinic is very professional and patient focused office. The staff is very cordial,  pleasant and are always concerned about making sure your concerns are addressed. I just love Dr. Krull. She takes the time to listen to my issues and always gives me several options with details about what each one involves. I feel very confident in her treatments & recommendations.|I have been seeing Dr. Michael Jaffe for over 15 years for various problems(shoulder, hips, and back). His genuine concern for your comfort is why I trust him with my care. I was thrilled to find that he had transferred to The Smart Clinic! I just saw him today for an injection in my spine, and will continue to go to the Smart Clinic to be treated by Dr. Jaffe.|Both my husband and I have had experience with Dr G and his staff. Their willingness to help and solid knowledge has made such  a difference in our lives. Dr G's astute observation literally saved my husband's life.  He recognized my husband's cancer so early that he was able to avoid radiation or chemo. I recommend the Smart Clinic wholeheartedly.

PainPro Specialists in South Jordan, Utah serves individuals suffering from injuries related to motor vehicle accidents with comprehensive pain management solutions. Our dedicated team of medical professionals specializes in treating both acute and chronic pain conditions using the latest evidence-based techniques. Whether you're experiencing whiplash, headaches, neck pain, or back pain following a collision, our specialists are equipped with advanced training to address your specific needs and guide you toward recovery.

At PainPro Specialists, we understand the complex nature of auto accident injuries and their impact on your daily life. Our medical doctors provide personalized consultations to evaluate your condition thoroughly and develop a tailored treatment plan that addresses your unique pain challenges. We pride ourselves on offering patient-centered care that focuses on both immediate pain relief and long-term recovery strategies.

Comprehensive Services

Our practice offers a full spectrum of pain management interventions specifically designed for motor vehicle accident victims. Each treatment plan is customized following a detailed assessment of your injuries and pain patterns. We utilize cutting-edge diagnostic tools and therapeutic approaches to ensure optimal outcomes for our patients.

Medical Lien Services

Understanding the financial burden that can accompany accident-related injuries, we offer all procedures on a medical lien basis. This arrangement allows patients to receive necessary treatment without upfront payment while their insurance claims or legal cases are being processed.

Contact Information

To schedule your personalized consultation with one of our pain management specialists, please contact us at +1 801-899-2053. Our clinic is conveniently located at 661 South Jordan Parkway, South Jordan, UT 84095.

For more information about our services and approach to pain management, visit our website at https://painprospecialists.com/.
column11:
PainPro Specialists specialize in helping those that have been injured in motor vehicle accidents.
We are dedicated to helping the acute or chronic injured patient by utilizing the latest techniques in medical care. Our medical professionals are trained to help those injured in motor vehicle collisions receive the care they need. All procedures can be done on a medical lien.

Suffering from headaches, whiplash, neck or back pain? We can help!

At PainPro Specialists you will receive a personalized consultation with one of our pain management medical doctors. They will determine the best treatment option for your personal pain needs.

column40:
Dr Schramm is awesome! He has been taking great care of me since my auto accident. His staff is equally awesome and I really appreciate the way I am treated! They are also very flexible with my work schedule! If only10 stars were an option !|Worth noting: I am not a car accident/injury patient, so I have a bit of a different perspective than many of his patients.

Dr. Schramm is so smart, so caring, and truly embodies functional medicine. For those who are not aware, he has a board-certified neurosurgeon on staff, and he is not your typical chiropractic witch doctor. I almost never get adjusted in my visits--I get traction which has produced x-ray results that are as clear as day.

He blends traditional medicine with newer/more experimental techniques according to the patient's wishes. He also offers a lot more than traditional chiropractic services, such as medical weight loss and various conservative pain management methods.

Also Marisela at the front desk is the best!|My son and I started treatments at UIC several months ago after a car accident. I was very apprehensive about chiropractors in general because of a bad past experience. All the staff at UIC are so welcoming and knowledgable and guided me through the process. Dr Schramm is very thorough in obtaining imaging first to see what is going on inside the body, before adjusting or doing any kind of treatments. He explains each treatment in detail and genuinely cares about his patients. My son is a special needs kiddo and they have been extra flexible and accommodating for him and our schedule. I highly recommend this facility and the many treatments they offer.|Great place for healing. Dr. Schramm is dedicated to helping his patients recover from their injuries. I love the welcoming environment and professional attitude. Maricela is a very special assistant. I'm so glad I found this team|So thankful for UIC 
After being injured in my first car accident, I
had no idea how to navigate the situation. I found the Utah Injury Clinic and was scheduled the same day. At my first appointment, Dr. Schramm explained the entire process and conducted thorough assessments to understand my injuries. Dr. Schramm not only addressed each of my physical injuries but also emphasized the importance of recognizing the emotional impact of the accident. I was overwhelmed with emotions like anger, guilt, confusion, etc. It wasn't until my first appointment with Dr. Schramm that I realized these feelings are completely normal after a car accident. This reassurance was incredibly healing for me. I received three months of treatment for my back and neck injuries. Dr. Schramm has multiple forms of treatment for physical injuries and is constantly assessing your healing progress. He truly listens to how you are feeling and adjusts treatment accordingly. His chiropractic adjustments released a lot of pain/tension in my neck and back. The decompression machine has provided tremendous relief as well. The massage therapist was absolutely amazing. The receptionist Marisela was so friendly and always followed up to make sure I remembered my appointments. They really treat you like family here :)|Welcoming and calm atmosphere. Doctor Schramm was very thorough in determining which treatment would be appropriate for my neck injury. Highly recommend anyone needing PT to go.|Love my experience here and everyone that works here! My family and I have been coming to Dr. Schramm on and off since 2016 and he has taken care of my spouse and I after two separate car accidents. My recent car accident left me in a lot of pain and feeling hopeless. After seeing Dr. Schramm (Chiropractor), Dr. Li (Orthopedic), and Cerae (Massage Therapist) for about a month, my pain decreased and I felt more positive. They supported me in every step of my healing journey. Dr. Schramm worked with my accident lawyers and took care of everything. He went above and beyond to make sure I was taken care of and my treatment was going well. Marisela (receptionist) was amazing in making sure I got all my appointments scheduled. I highly recommend UIC for any and all chiropractic needs and or pain management.|Dr. Schramm has being the first chiropractor that took an xray to see what needed to be treated.
He was fenomenal!!!

Thank you for everything!!!

column3:
The Lift Clinic serves Salt Lake City, Utah with specialized care focused on pain management and comprehensive treatment solutions. Located in the heart of downtown, our clinic has pioneered innovative approaches to diagnosing and treating complex pain conditions that many patients have struggled with for years. We've established ourselves as leaders in addressing headaches, TMJ disorders, facial pain syndromes, and migraines through our commitment to finding root causes rather than merely managing symptoms.

At The Lift Clinic, we believe effective treatment begins with accurate diagnosis. Each patient journey starts with a thorough comprehensive history, detailed physical examination, and advanced 3D imaging to identify the underlying causes of pain. This meticulous diagnostic process allows us to develop targeted treatment plans that address the source of discomfort rather than simply masking symptoms.

Specialized Treatment Solutions

Our clinic has developed treatment protocols that have achieved an unmatched success rate in the pain management industry. We specialize in conditions that are frequently misdiagnosed or inadequately treated elsewhere, including:

  • Chronic headaches and migraines

  • TMJ disorders

  • Complex facial pain syndromes

  • Related neuromuscular conditions

Beyond Symptom Management

Unlike traditional approaches that rely heavily on medication to manage symptoms, we focus on correcting the underlying conditions that cause pain. This philosophy guides our treatment approach and has helped countless patients find lasting relief when other therapeutic management regimens have failed.

Visit Our Clinic

We look forward to serving you at our Salt Lake City location. Contact us today to schedule your comprehensive evaluation.

Address: 420 E South Temple St #336, Salt Lake City, UT 84111

Phone: (801) 996-7076

Website: https://theliftclinic.com/
column11: We are here to help. Our first commitment to our patients, or our prospective patients is an accurate diagnosis. Effective treatment starts with the right diagnosis. We offer the diagnosis after a thorough comprehensive history, examination and 3D imaging. We have pioneered a success rate that is unmatched in the pain management industry--especially for headaches, TMJ, complex facial pain syndromes and migraines. Our highest goal is to get the diagnosis right and fix the underlying condition which is often over looked with other therapeutic management regimens, like drug therapy, which ends up only treating symptoms. We don't want to just manage--we want to solve the problem. We look forward to serving you today.

It's good to know someone's got my back now (literally!), whenever my spine needs a little reset.|Dr. Chapman is a gifted and caring practitioner. When I showed up I had been in chronic pain from cervical disk issues for months and it was only worsening. I also suspected I had sleep apnea, as well as severe TMJ issues and teeth grinding all my life.

The discovery process was fascinating and there's so much custom-made, state of the art equipment he's invented to precisely measure what's going on, and adjust you. After getting the custom-made equibite device fitted, my narrow airway doubled in size increasing my capacity to breathe, my TMJ pain has lessened a lot, and still improving, and the pain down my arm dropped from an 8/10 to a 1 over three days. I'm only a month into the treatment.

Had I not found the Lift Clinic, I'd have needed surgical intervention so that I could continue to work. And I'd still have bad, undiagnosed sleep apnea, which causes a whole host of other health problems that compound over time. Eventually I'd have found out and be tied to a CPAP machine every night.

Dr. Chapman is a life-saver and I feel very lucky to have found this place. My quality of life has significantly increased, and rapidly.

Also the assistants, Britt and Karlee are so caring and brighten my day every time. Everyone there cares and makes you feel like a VIP. I feel like I'm in really good hands.|Dr. Chapman has helped improve my quality of life immensely. I saw him at his previous location years ago. I could barely walk. I was using a cane. After a few visits I felt a lot less pain and was able to walk without a cane. I stopped going to him after several visits because I stayed aligned. I recently could tell that my neck was back out of alignment and got realigned and feel so much better. I highly recommend anybody that has neck pain, back pain, jaw pain, or pain that needs taken care of to schedule a consultation.

I can't thank him enough!!|This is a top tier institution to get either your bite or posture fixed as well as many other things I imagine they do. For me it was life changing. I can stand taller, correctly, my legs are no longer different sizes, my sciatica pain is gone, my scapula is forming back into place. For a non surgical procedure, magic is how I would describe it. The well oiled team at Lift Clinic under the direction of Dr. Chapman is not to be over looked. I want to reiterate that after I finished my instructions my body functioned the way it was supposed to. After seeing countless specialists, Dr. Chapman new exactly what to do.

Hit the second ball first and go to the lift clinic. you will not regret it!|Nearly two years ago, MY BROTHER came to the Lift Clinic. Chronically ill and desperate for help he paid Dr. Chapman $7,000. He did not have any improvement with his symptoms and is still disabled by his symptoms to this day. The Dr said he was an anomaly. There are no refunds. Buyer ABSOLUTELY beware. YOU ARE NOT GUARANTEED TO GET BETTER HERE. THIS IS CRIMINAL.|The Lift Clinic is extraordinary. Amazing staff. Exceptionally knowledgeable. My life hasn't been worth living for 15+years. One visit and my entire outlook on the future has changed. I feel the closest to normal me than I've been able to feel in decades. I've been able to change my abilities to perform normal daily activities and my duties to those I love. Life has been ridiculously challenging but now I can allow myself to have expectations of greater fulfillment of my life and life purposes. More energy, less obstacle. My friends noticed the difference immediately. My sweetheart has never really met me, normal me...til now.
Thank you, Dr.Chapman and your diligent staff. Living without 24hr headaches, nausea and vertigo; without constant neck pain is a 15 year miracle. I am so encouraged by your care and continued support. Thank you.|My TMJ was causing severe hearing loss. Other medical visits provided no help. My experience at Lift clinic has been wonderful. Dr Chapman is very thorough and professional. He explained every step of the treatment and was helpful in making adjustments . The entire staff are knowledgeable and friendly. I feel this has helped tremendously and that the procedure will ensure improved hearing and no morning headaches. I highly recommend the Lift clinic.
Joanne Fraser|If I could give higher than a 5 star rating, I would. I have been dealing with back and neck pain since 2015, with my symptoms in my upper cervical area getting more severe over the past year. I had went to a few other doctors who either gaslit me or wanted to prescribe me medication instead of searching for the root cause of my symptoms. I finally found Doctor Chapman, who finally looked further and was able to give me a diagnosis and treatment. I have been coming for about two months and I am as close to pain free as I have been in over a year. Doctor Chapman and his team are wonderful and they truly really care about their patients. They all go above and beyond. Going to The Lift Clinic has been the best decision I have made. I feel like I have my life back. I highly recommend The Lift Clinic!

Southwest Spine and Pain Center serves St. George, Utah with comprehensive pain management services through Vista Healthcare. Our dedicated team specializes in addressing chronic and acute pain conditions using evidence-based approaches tailored to each patient's unique needs.

Taylor Beatty, FNP-C is a board-certified Family Nurse Practitioner committed to delivering exceptional pain management care. Taylor earned his Bachelor of Science in nursing from Southern Utah University before advancing his education with a master's degree from Frontier Nursing University. With specialized training in mental health, Taylor brings a holistic perspective to pain management, recognizing the important connection between physical discomfort and psychological wellbeing. His bilingual capabilities in both English and Spanish allow him to serve a diverse patient population with personalized attention.

Comprehensive Pain Management Services

At Southwest Spine and Pain Center, we offer a wide range of interventional and non-interventional treatments designed to improve quality of life and restore function. column38: Andy Munro|Steph
column40:
I am absolutely appalled at my treatment at the hands of the front desk staff in this office. I suffer from extreme chronic pain and at the advice of my Primary Care Doctor have been trying to schedule an appointment with Dr Junkins for over two months. I have called many times, my Primary sent a referral and also emailed a note directly to the Doctor explaining the severity of my case. Weeks later, neither myself or my Doctor have heard anything back and when I call, all I get is voicemail.
I hear Dr Junkins is a very good Physician, but sadly his services are being denied to potential patients by Pam and the front desk staff who are either incompetent or feel that they have the medical knowledge required to grant or deny services to patients.
On the few occasions I was able to get through, I got the feeling that it is the new patients responsibility to prove they are not just wanting a prescription and are indeed a genuine case. It seems they operate on the basis that you're guilty until proven innocent, which is beyond wrong. Both myself and my Primary made it quite clear that this appointment is just for a second opinion, no prescription expected, or required.
It is my fundamental right as a patient with the required referral, to be able to make an appointment with Dr Junkins and to be denied this and treated in such an inhumane manner by front desk staff is bordering on criminal. I would suggest you avoid this office at all costs, which is a shame because I hear Dr Juknins is one of the best in his field.|Dr. Junkins fights for his patients,  he really listens and never cuts their time short even if they go over.  For this reason he can get behind but i assure you he's well worth the wait hes an amazing provider,  he doesn't take any attitude from a trigger point and has done these injections for me many times!

column2: Interventional Pain Medicine, University of Vermont Medical Center
column3:
Interventional Pain Medicine at The University of Vermont Medical Center serves South Burlington, Vermont and surrounding communities with specialized pain management solutions. Established as a vital component of the UVM Health Network, this practice combines advanced interventional techniques with comprehensive care plans to address chronic and acute pain conditions. Their team of board-certified pain specialists utilizes evidence-based approaches to improve patients' quality of life while minimizing reliance on opioid medications.

The practice offers a wide range of minimally invasive procedures and therapeutic interventions designed to target the source of pain. Treatments include epidural steroid injections, nerve blocks, radiofrequency ablation, spinal cord stimulation, and joint injections. Each treatment plan is customized to address the unique needs of patients suffering from conditions such as back pain, neck pain, arthritis, complex regional pain syndrome, and post-surgical pain.

Expert Medical Team

The clinical staff at Interventional Pain Medicine includes fellowship-trained physicians who specialize in diagnosing and treating complex pain disorders. Working alongside nurses and medical assistants dedicated to pain management, these specialists take a multidisciplinary approach that may incorporate physical therapy, behavioral health strategies, and advanced interventional techniques to achieve optimal outcomes.

Patient-Centered Approach

Understanding that pain affects each person differently, the practice emphasizes individualized care plans and patient education. New patients undergo comprehensive evaluations to determine the underlying causes of their pain before any treatment recommendations are made. This thorough approach ensures that interventions address not just symptoms but the root causes of discomfort.

Location and Accessibility

Conveniently located at 62 Tilley Drive, Suite 201 in South Burlington, VT 05403, the facility offers modern treatment rooms equipped with state-of-the-art technology. The practice is easily accessible from Interstate 89 and provides ample parking for patients. For appointments or inquiries, patients can call +1 802-847-3737 or visit their website at https://www.uvmhealth.org/medcenter/location/interventional-pain-medicine.

column40:
My first appointment was awesome, I was very early and they got me in and out before my actual appointment. Dr Casandra Mysior is awesome, her staff is awesome, professional and caring. I had a nerve block done and it was basically painless. The quality of care and service here is well above board. I was seeing a pain clinic here in Plattsburgh but had to go to Vermont to get proper care, and I'm telling you that I am glad I did. Don't wait for problems to get bad, transfer all of your pain needs to UVM pain management immediately. You will enjoy your appointments a lot more if you see the Drs at Tilley Drive, Burlington.|Dr Zhu made the process more confusing, raising her voice when I struggled to answer her questions (I am autistic and it's noted in my chart) and she misgendered me calling me ma'am (even tho it is noted on my chart I am transgender). I don't think she read anything in my chart except notes from a psych stay when I was suicidal during my Ehlers Danlos diagnosis odyssey because no one believed me. In her notes she wrote she checked the range of motion but didn't say of what, and she didn't check range of motion of anything. She touched me lightly on the back of my neck for 12 seconds and called that an exam and in the notes wrote she had a difficult time getting me to explain my pain. I switched to another provider at that place but I'm not holding my breath . Dr Zhu forgot the compassion part of medicine I guess. She just seemed angry and annoyed to be at work and too impatient for an anxious autistic patient to explain their issue.|I am extremely dissatisfied with this practice! My father is in terrible pain from peripheral neuropathy and was told 1 year ago that a spinal cord stimulator might really help him. We agreed and it has been a nightmare for a year just trying to get them to put in the trial. Absolutely unbelievable how uncaring this practice is about a patient's chronic pain. There is absolutely no sense of responsibility or urgency to manage my father's pain. To string an old man along for a year, promising him that he will get a spinal cord stimulator trial and then to cancel twice on him, is awful. Not only did they cancel, but they cancelled both times very close to the appointment. In fact, they confirmed 2 days prior and then cancelled the day before. The reason they gave was unacceptable. I would not recommend this practice to anyone. Very sad. I am giving one star because I cannot give zero stars to post this comment.|WOW, possibly the most useless doctor's appointment I've ever been to. I first started suffering from chronic pain four years ago, after a bout of serious depression. When I visited the pain clinic, they told me to come back when I had "dealt with" my psychological issues. When I arrived at my appointment yesterday (which I had to BEG them to give me--they apparently refuse to treat patients with psychiatric problems--discrimination, much?), and Dr. Brauner was rude and extremely dismissive from the moment he entered the room. He refused to do any diagnostics or other examinations, and he told me I should take so much Gabapentin (a relative of Xanax, that helps with neuropathic pain) that I was groggy/too tired, and then I would probably be in less pain. When I replied that I would rather look into treating the SOURCE of the pain, as opposed to numbing the pain, he literally said that he had no suggestions. He had absolutely no empathy or bedside manner. Incredible waste of time and money.
I would recommend the Mind-Body Medicine clinic instead, if you suffer from chronic pain and want an empathetic doctor who is actually knowledgable and willing to help find your cause and cure.|45mins on hold during mid afternoon on a Thursday is just ridiculously unacceptable. UVM is getting worse and worse... Also when it comes to Covid - masks and the vaccine are pointless and dangerous. #TrustTheScience|I have been a patient for over ten years. For the most part the Doctors, nurses, clerks, have all been great. Always treat me with respect, as i respect them. For sure have always been kind and courteous.|Couldn't find results that were to be transferred from Florida|Horrible!  I have never been in a practice that cared so little about their patients.

column40:
Started this with lots of pain, and about 40% use of my shoulder, and skepticism! Now, after completing the program, I would say I have 80% use, and the pain is minimal! The people at the Colchester office are fantastic, and were willing to work around my schedule.|I have arthritis in my toe and had severe pain at times. The treatment has got me to 70% better with less pain, discomfort and more mobility. The process and staff at QC was excellent and very happy with the improvement it provided.|I had very high pain levels taking place when a trusted friend suggested that I consider QC Kinetix in Colchester, Vermont. I had mentioned that a knee replacement seemed inevitable. She was very concerned that I was making a big mistake. The next day I began my first of five treatment sessions as a new patient in Colchester. After the first session some of my pain in my knee seemed like it was migrating at times to both hips, but after the second session it was already becoming clear that pain was greatly reduced throughout my knee and no further hip pain was present either. The third session brought much more widespread relief and I now speak of this non-surgical regenerative treatment as being practically miraculous! I am so fortunate to have trusted my friend's judgment and become a patient of QC Kinetix. The people are great, the place is very clean, comfortable and well run by the professionals I have worked with!|My first time and I think they're great yeah very friendly and kind with a upbeat vibe I'm happy to meet them and I'm sure they can help me feel back to myself soon|I have been thrilled with the results of my regenerative knee treatments! As an avid cyclist, skier and pickleball player, QC Kinetics has allowed me to keep doing what I love to do at a high level. I also love the friendly professional service that the entire staff provides. Thank you!|QC Kinetics and all the workers were welcoming!  They take care and make each individual feel special and listened too!  My knees are so much happier and we get to walk everywhere with my family!  June 2024
This really works and improves your ability to move and follow the grandchildren everywhere!|I received treatment at QC Kinetix due to knee pain and not being able to exercise because of it. I am now able to squat and jump with much more ease than before. I would highly recommend as an alternative to surgery. The staff are great as well.|I've only attended QC Kinetics for injections so I have no basis for comparison. I did find the introductory appointment to be a little "sales pitchy", which I wasn't ready for and found a little discouraging.
However, once I started receiving injections I thought the staff was professional and capable.
Their facility is very nice. Everything is clean and comfortable.
Unfortunately the injection protocol I signed up for has not fixed my issue. However, the staff at QC Kinetics is continuing to work with me in helping to alleviate my pain, which I greatly appreciate.

They put you on hold and then hang up and never return the call if you leave a voicemail.|It is a great place to get help with managing pain.  I have been going since 2011- present they have helped me with controlling my sciatic nerve. Second they help with blocking my pain in my tailbone (fractured in 2 places) I can finally sit from injury when I was 15 years old.  I enjoy the fact that they listen to me and didn't treat me like I was just a paycheck. We still have more to work on with my back  but to have relief even a little gives me hope. Thank you spine and pain. I had a procedure is called ablation by Dr.Singh to my lower back it went wrong radio frequency was turn to high now i have serious pain in my brain and neck so choose as you will on your own. They don't want to believe me but I'm the one who's suffering from headaches and stabbing pain so good luck everyone  now I only manage with medication for now.|The best of the best. The doctors here truly care, and want to help you get back to your old self and continue with your normal life. My doctor, Dr.Daniel Sanchez is the best person I have ever had for my medical needs, a true professional in every way. If you have any spine problems, any doctor here will be your best bet. The nurses are awesome and you will be glad you went, their smiles are contagious. I have started seeing Dr. Brian Lecuyer and I hope that things keep going as well as possible. Nurse Heather and her crew are awesome. I understand there are some that have problems with medication addiction, but it seems Brian doesn't hold that against his more trustworthy and honest patients. I have dealt with doctors that blame all patients for a few bad ones. In the long run I ended up leaving this pain clinic because the problem that I had to deal with to get the lack of pain relief wasn't worth it. I never got any real relief from the doctors here and as my pain went up their willingness to help went down. The threats to take medication away went above and beyond. My primary care doctor took over and now I am in tolerable pain and able to live my life. Stay away from here if your in a long term pain situation, they will refuse to help you.|I have been going here since 2016 and I'm grateful everyday to have the care I receive from your office. I have recommended several people to you guys because I know they will get the best care like I do. My calls and messages are always answered in a timely manner. I love the professionalism and attentiveness from everyone that works there. Kelly is absolutely amazing and understanding and I couldn't have picked a better provider. Thank you Champlain Spine!|The most I love about the Spine center is the care givers. They are so caring and compassionate.. I have never felt like a number. Everything is done to make sure you get relief  from your pain. Would recommend  the Spine Center to anyone dealing with problems.|I have been a patient of Champlain Spine for a number of years. Every single person at the office and the Surgical Center has been an integral part of my treatment. I have recommended many friends and family to them because when you have the best, you want the best for others. My pain is managed, the staff is amazing and extremely knowledgeable. I thank God every day that I was referred here so many years ago. I am humbled and grateful for the treatment I receive from the reception desk right on up through to the doctors on staff. I know I'm in good hands.

Her practice encompasses pre-operative assessment, pain management during surgery, and post-operative care to ensure patients experience minimal discomfort and optimal recovery. Dr. Lake works collaboratively with surgical teams to create tailored anesthesia plans that account for each patient's unique medical history and needs.

Practice Location and Accessibility

Dr. Lake practices at 62 Tilley Dr #201, South Burlington, VT 05403, conveniently located within the University of Vermont Medical Center network. The modern facility offers state-of-the-art equipment and a comfortable environment for consultations and pre-operative assessments. Patients can easily schedule appointments by calling +1 802-847-3737 or visiting the UVM Health website.

Education and Professional Background

With credentials from respected medical institutions, Dr. Lake brings academic excellence and practical experience to her anesthesiology practice. Her commitment to staying current with the latest advancements in anesthetic techniques and patient safety protocols ensures that her patients receive the highest standard of care during surgical procedures at UVM Medical Center.

For more information about Dr. Tiffini Lake's services or to schedule a consultation, please visit her provider profile at UVM Health.

column3:
Vermont Orofacial Pain Associates in South Burlington, Vermont specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of complex orofacial conditions that affect thousands of Vermonters. Our dedicated team of specialists has established a reputation for excellence in addressing Temporomandibular Joint Disorders (TMD), Orofacial Pain (OFP), and sleep-related breathing disorders through evidence-based approaches. Located conveniently at 40A Timber Lane, our practice combines advanced diagnostic technology with compassionate care to help patients regain comfort and functionality.

At Vermont Orofacial Pain Associates, we understand that TMD and orofacial pain can significantly impact your quality of life. Our doctors and supporting staff are committed to identifying the root causes of your discomfort rather than simply treating symptoms. Through comprehensive evaluations and personalized treatment plans, we address the unique needs of each patient who walks through our doors.

Our Clinical Focus Areas

Our practice specializes in three primary areas of care:

  • Temporomandibular Joint Disorders (TMD) - Including jaw pain, clicking, locking, and related symptoms

  • Orofacial Pain (OFP) - Addressing chronic facial pain, headaches, and neuromuscular disorders

  • Dental Sleep Medicine - Providing solutions for sleep apnea and other sleep-related breathing disorders

Evidence-Based Approach

What sets Vermont Dental Medicine apart is our unwavering commitment to evidence-based diagnosis and treatment. We utilize the latest research and technology to ensure that our patients receive the most effective care possible. This approach allows us to develop targeted treatment strategies that address the underlying causes of your condition.

To schedule a consultation or learn more about how we can help improve your quality of life, contact us at (802) 862-7185 or visit our website at vttmj.com. Our South Burlington office is ready to welcome you and help you on your journey to relief and recovery.
column11:
The doctors and supporting staff at Vermont Orofacial pain Associates/ Vermont Dental Medicine are committed to improving the quality of life for patients who suffer with Temporomandibular Joint Disorders (TMD), Orofacial Pain (OFP) and Dental Sleep Medicine.
We believe that an evidence-based diagnosis of the root causes of TMD, OFP and Sleep disorders is central to providing a successful treatment plan to suit the needs of each individual.

column3:
Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation at Rutland Regional serves Rutland, Vermont with comprehensive rehabilitative care designed to help patients recover function, reduce pain, and improve their quality of life. Our specialized team of physiatrists and rehabilitation specialists provides evidence-based treatments for patients recovering from injuries, surgeries, strokes, and those managing chronic conditions that affect mobility and daily functioning.

At Physical Medicine & Rehabilitation, we offer a multidisciplinary approach to patient care, combining medical expertise with therapeutic interventions. Our services include physical therapy, occupational therapy, speech therapy, and specialized rehabilitation programs tailored to each patient's unique needs. We work closely with other departments at Rutland Regional Medical Center to ensure coordinated care throughout your recovery journey.

Conditions We Treat

Our specialists have extensive experience treating a wide range of conditions, including:

  • Stroke rehabilitation

  • Traumatic brain injuries

  • Spinal cord injuries

  • Joint replacements

  • Sports injuries

  • Chronic pain management

  • Neurological disorders

  • Amputation care and prosthetic training

Patient-Centered Approach

We believe in developing personalized treatment plans that address each patient's specific goals and challenges. Our team works collaboratively with patients and their families to establish realistic rehabilitation objectives and provide the support needed to achieve them. Regular assessments ensure that treatment plans evolve as patients progress through their recovery.

Visit Our Facility

Located at 160 Allen St, Rutland, VT 05701, our modern rehabilitation center is equipped with state-of-the-art technology and therapeutic equipment. To schedule an appointment or learn more about our services, please call us at (802) 747-3633. Additional information about our programs and services can be found on our website at www.rrmc.org/locations/profile/physical-medicine-and-rehabilitation/.

Burlington ReliefNow Laser Methods serves Burlington, Vermont and surrounding communities with advanced laser therapy solutions for pain management and injury recovery. Our Burlington Laser Pain Center has developed a proprietary "gentle & painless" laser treatment protocol that effectively addresses debilitating injuries without invasive procedures. We specialize in reducing inflammation, alleviating swelling, and minimizing pain while simultaneously accelerating your body's natural healing processes. Our dedicated team of specialists understands how chronic pain can impact every aspect of your life, which is why we're committed to providing personalized care plans tailored to your specific condition.

At Burlington ReliefNow Laser Methods, we focus on treating the root cause of your pain rather than simply masking symptoms. Our non-invasive laser therapy offers a compelling alternative to surgical interventions and long-term medication use. Patients experiencing joint pain, sports injuries, arthritis, neuropathy, and various chronic pain conditions have found significant relief through our specialized treatments. We utilize state-of-the-art laser technology that penetrates deep into tissue to stimulate cellular regeneration and promote healing at the source of your discomfort.

Benefits of Our Laser Therapy

Our laser treatment protocols offer numerous advantages over conventional pain management approaches, including:

  • Non-invasive therapy with no downtime

  • Reduction in inflammation and swelling

  • Accelerated tissue repair and cell growth

  • Improved vascular activity and circulation

  • Reduced need for pain medications

  • No known side effects when properly administered

Take Back Your Active Lifestyle

Don't let pain control your life any longer. Our mission is to help you recover and return to the active, pain-free lifestyle you deserve. Many of our patients report significant improvement after just a few sessions, with continued benefits throughout their treatment plan. We invite you to schedule a consultation to learn how our proprietary laser methods can address your specific condition and help you avoid surgery while reducing or eliminating dependency on pain medications.

Contact Information:

Phone: +1 802-864-5000

Address: 48 Colchester Ave, Burlington, VT 05401, United States

Website: www.reliefnowlaserburlington.com

Schedule Your Consultation Now! Take the first step toward a pain-free life by contacting our office today.

Contact us to find out how to avoid the knife and reduce or eliminate the drugs! Let's get to the root cause versus masking your symptoms. Schedule Your Consultation Now!

The practice's modern facility on Dorset Street houses state-of-the-art diagnostic and treatment technologies, enabling our team to provide both medical and cosmetic dermatology services under one roof.

At Dorset Street Dermatology, we offer a complete range of skin care solutions including skin cancer screenings, acne treatment, psoriasis management, eczema care, and treatment for various other dermatological conditions. Our cosmetic services include Botox, dermal fillers, chemical peels, and laser treatments, all performed with meticulous attention to detail and patient safety. Each treatment plan is customized to address the unique needs and concerns of our patients, ensuring optimal outcomes and satisfaction.

Expert Medical Team

Patient-Centered Approach

column38: D B|halle klinger|Maddie|Jillian Bogert|Phil Surks|Mary Masse|Mark Schneider|Susan Polgreen
column40:
As a long time patient of this practice I was disappointed at the changes once the practice sold and would not recommend to anyone.  Nebulous billing practices, overwhelmed staff and long wait times for appointments are just a few of the experiences to be had should you choose Dorset Street Dermatology.  The practice manager is combative responding to the most basic of questions in a adversarial manner with no interest in servicing clients. I am no longer able to trust in the services they offer and have happily gone elsewhere.|Amazing staff, super knowledgeable and friendly. Had to have a scar treated and everyone there made an effort to fully explain the procedure and make sure I was comfortable the whole time. Couldn't recommend them more!|Because of the high volume of patients, I had to wait to be seen for 6 months. Which is no fault to the office itself. However, once I was roomed, my appointment lasted about 10 minutes. I explained my medical situation to the  provider and she didn't seem to want to give me the time of day. She didn't answer the questions I had. The provider told me there was nothing I could do to in order to treat my pain. I'm now left with trying to get into other dermatologists and doctors in the area who are booked out months. I'm so sad that this happened because I thought I'd finally get some guidance on how to proceed with my treatment.|Experience with doctor was great after almost a year wait. Update - they processed payment and also sent me to collections. Said it was a miscommunication - Avoid this location.
Schedule and billing were well below par. Rescheduled multiple times due to Dr. being out, long re-schedule wait time (months). First billing is via text already saying balance overdue. I was very clear this was a preventive pre-cancerous screening visit, but was billed as a new patient specialist visit not preventive. They charge for free preventive services regardless of referral from my primary care doctor and preventive coverage from the insurance|The folks at DSD are great.  I have no complaints about my care there.  My negative review relates to their billing department.  They are THE WORST.  They constantly make mistakes, and they are nearly impossible to get on the phone.  There are always ridiculously long wait times (possibly due to the volume of mistakes they make).  If you use the option to leave a voicemail, they NEVER call back.  Based on this aggravating aspect of using this practice I would advise going somewhere else for your care.|I made an appointment for a full body check. I expected a thorough exam. The provider spent maybe 5 minutes on the exam. I have a ton of moles too. Maybe I just didn't know what to expect, but it did not feel comprehensive at all. My husband goes to another practice yearly and said his exams and very extensive. I will find another provider next time. This didn't seem right.|they seem to be competent Dermatologists. They did a skin check for me. However, business-wise, they leave something to be desired. They didn't send me an invoice for $25 and then tried to collect by email and called me a 1:20 in the morning. It seemed like a scam to me. I called and was told I owed just $25 (which I didnt know).|I truly cannot say enough good things about this practice. Kara is one of the best clinicians I have ever had- extremely kind, thorough, person-centered, and delivers the absolute highest quality of care. Sarah is also incredibly friendly, knowledgeable, and immediately makes you feel at ease. I have never once felt rushed and my questions are always answered thoughtfully and with great care. I cannot recommend Dorset St Dermatology enough!

Taconic Spine in Manchester Center, Vermont offers comprehensive spine care services to residents throughout Bennington County and surrounding areas. Our specialized medical practice focuses on diagnosing and treating a wide range of spinal conditions using both conservative and surgical approaches. With a patient-centered philosophy, we combine advanced medical expertise with compassionate care to help patients overcome pain and mobility issues related to spinal disorders.

At Taconic Spine, we provide thorough evaluations and personalized treatment plans for conditions including herniated discs, spinal stenosis, degenerative disc disease, scoliosis, and chronic back pain. Our approach begins with conservative treatments whenever possible, including physical therapy, medication management, and minimally invasive procedures, progressing to surgical interventions only when necessary for optimal patient outcomes.

Our Facility and Location

Conveniently located at 3505 Richville Rd in Manchester Center, VT 05255, our modern facility is equipped with state-of-the-art diagnostic and treatment technology. The clinic's serene setting in the Taconic Mountains region provides a calming environment for patients seeking relief from spinal conditions.

Contact Information

To schedule a consultation or learn more about our services, patients can reach us at +1 802-366-1144 or visit our comprehensive website at http://taconicspine.com/. Our dedicated staff is available to answer questions about treatment options, insurance coverage, and appointment availability.

Taconic Spine is committed to improving quality of life through expert spinal care, helping patients return to their daily activities with reduced pain and enhanced mobility. Our practice continues to serve as a trusted healthcare resource for the Manchester Center community and throughout Vermont.

Went to Taconic spine for pain relief in my neck for pain relief c2 -c4, for my first visit, I only get local so I know what's being done, did the 3 on my left side all good on the 3rd on the right I told him i was in pain he gave me another shot in no 2 not 3 tried again and pain, after the 3rd try all was good, mean while telling we were on no 2 not 3, he was wrong and apologized for the mistake, on the follow up told them I was still getting head aches, did steroid shots still head aches, 3rd visit got 3 disc done and told them he wasn't doing the right disc it was to low, now this after the 3rd visit they tell me I need to go back to Champlain spine center they don't go that high in the neck, you screw up the first time then do the wrong ones the 2nd time, and then tell me to go some where else for care, this guy is dangerous, been getting this done for 8 yrs. Never had so many problems with it. Talking with legal representatives to see about getting him shut down, he had my prior paperwork from champlain spine and new what needed to be done and hid the fact he couldn't, then never got follow up phone calls, this place should be shut down and he should loose his medical license. I will make sure of this.  Do not go here.|The scheduling at this facility is very frustrating. I had an appointment I made almost 2 months ago and upon arrival, told me appointment was rescheduled to the next month with no communication. I took the day off work to be able to make this very important appointment for my pain, and no sympathy just a we will call you. I'm taking my business elsewhere. Dr. Guering is quite good but getting through this mess is challenging.|A great practice. Dr.Giering is a wonderful professional and person. September 5th I had another medial branch nerve ablation. After having been to another pain management clinic where you felt like a an anonymous piece of furniture, Dr giehring is a remarkable individual, a fantastic physician and I can only say that I appreciate what he has done tremendously allowing me to continue an active life. I highly recommend taconic spine!|Thank you for helping me with my chronic pain.
I have been going here for about 4 years. I need surgery, stenosis is bad.
I would have never gone anywhere else.
Never.
Dr. Geiring helped me to keep working!
He was always respectful.
I would recommend this Dr.|Dr. Giering is a phenomenal physician who truly cares about his patients. You're not treated as a number. He goes above and beyond to find a care plan that works specifically for you. Good doctors are hard to find these days and I'm grateful that he is one of mine!!! I highly recommend Taconic Spine Center for your pain. The office has a warm atmosphere, the staff are kind and humbly intelligent.
